descriptionHtml:
This is sets of animated moving wings for your character. They are craftable at a tanning rack after you collect the ingredients. They are quiver wings meaning the game thinks they are arrows and to use a bow you need to switch quivers, use bow and arrows, then re-equip quiver-wings. This is a reupload of a previous mod by me. Check the video to see the wing types. For males and females, all races.
The wings are found in weapons ammo in inventory after you craft them.

THESE WINGS ARE FOR VANILLA SKELETON WITH NO ARROW OR QUIVER MODS !

DO NOT upload anywhere else and permission is needed from me to use assets, thanks
author: badgremlin
